# layoutFrame

**Instance Property**

The layout guide’s frame in its owning view’s coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var layoutFrame: CGRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The layout guide defines a rectangular space in its owning view’s coordinate system. This property contains a valid [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CGRect] value by the time its owning view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/layoutSubviews()] method is called.

## Related Documentation

- **layoutSubviews()**: Lays out subviews.

## Working with layout guides

- **identifier**: A string used to identify the layout guide.
- **owningView**: The view that owns this layout guide.
